title: Could you recommend any songs similar to this song? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know a lot of Chinese songs like this, BUT I do know of one…  That’s it though. HOWEVER, I can recommend English songs that SOUND similar in genre (Chillstep and Future Bass). Here’s a few…        Hopefully at least one of those are what you’re looking for! As a sidenote, thanks for the new song! I added Just to Find You to one of my playlists!
